mapper.insert: insert into car (corporation, model_name, car_type, model_year, few_seats, gear_type) values (#{corporation}, #{modelName}, #{carType}, #{modelYear}, #{fewSeats}, #{gearType})
mapper.select: select * from car where corporation like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or model_name like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or car_type like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or model_year like concat('%', #{query}, '%')
